title: Pak Army shoots down Indian spying quadcopter
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 27 (APP):Pakistan Army on Wednesday shot down an Indian spying quadcopter in Rakhchikri Sector along the Line of Control (LoC).
The quadcopter had intruded 650 meters on Pakistanâ€™s side of the LoC, said Director General ISPR Major General Babar Iftikhar in a tweet.
He said intrusion by the Indian spying quadcopter is Saffron terrorism.
